Uses of Class
camzup.core.Mesh3

Packages that use Mesh3 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Mesh3 in camzup.core

    Fields in camzup.core with type parameters of type Mesh3 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.List<Mesh3> MeshEntity3.meshes
    The list of meshes held by the entity.
    Methods in camzup.core that return Mesh3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.circle​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a regular convex polygon, approximating a circle.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.cube​(Mesh3 target)
    Generates a cube mesh.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.dodecahedron​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates an dodecahedron, a Platonic solid with twelve faces, each face being a pentagon.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.fromObj​(java.lang.String[] lines, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a mesh from an array of strings.
    Mesh3 MeshEntity3.getMesh​(int i)
    Gets a mesh from this mesh entity.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.icosahedron​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates an icosahedron, a Platonic solid with twenty faces.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.octahedron​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates an octahedron, a Platonic solid with eight faces.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.plane​(int cols, int rows, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a plane subdivided into either tris or quads, depending on the polygon type.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.plane​(int div, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a subdvided plane.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.polygon​(int sectors, Mesh3 target)
    Generates a regular convex polygon.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotate​(float radians, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates all coordinates and normals in the mesh by an angle around an arbitrary axis.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotate​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates all coordinates and normals in the mesh by a quaternion.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotateX​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates and normals in the mesh by an angle around the x axis.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotateY​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates and normals in the mesh by an angle around the y axis.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates and normals in the mesh by an angle around the z axis.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.scale​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a scalar.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.scale​(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a vector.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.set​(int[][][] faces, Vec3[] coords, Vec2[] texCoords, Vec3[] normals)
    Sets the mesh's data by reference, not by value.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.sphere​(float radius, int longitudes, int latitudes, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a UV sphere.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.sphere​(float radius, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a UV sphere.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.sphere​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a UV sphere.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.square​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a square.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.tetrahedron​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a tetrahedron, a Platonic solid with four faces.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.torus​(float radius, float tubeRadius, int xDetail, int yDetail, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a torus.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.torus​(float radius, float tubeRadius, Mesh3 target)
    Creates a torus.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.torus​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a torus.
    Mesh3 Mesh3.translate​(Vec3 v)
    Translates all coordinates in the mesh by a vector.
    static Mesh3 Mesh3.triangle​(Mesh3 target)
    Creates a triangle.
    Methods in camzup.core that return types with arguments of type Mesh3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Iterator<Mesh3> MeshEntity3.iterator()
    Returns an iterator, which allows an enhanced for-loop to access the meshes in the mesh entity.
